item.title: Gitflow Pull Request
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Git is one of the most popular source control. Github is one platform built over the top of Git and well adapted by lots of companies.

item.title: Git Commit Message Convention
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: I bumped into an article a few days ago. It was short and simple, related enough to make me wonder if we have the same thing in the team.
